name: Ordering
description: The Gate of Ordering - The power to bring order out of chaos through innovation

channel.name: Mutation
channel.description: The Channel of Mutation - A Design of Energy which Initiates and Fluctuates - Pulse

signal.script: You're in the fertile chaos before order emerges. What single thread can you follow right now?
experiments: Choose one thing and commit to it for today only
Create a simple structure to contain the chaos
Map the confusion visually to see patterns

friction.script: You have the gift of new beginnings, but completion also serves innovation. What needs to reach the next stage?
experiments: Complete one small thing fully before starting another
Document your innovations to track progress
Partner with someone who excels at follow-through

breakpoint.trigger: Loss of faith in innovation capacity
breakpoint.script: Your innovative spirit is not brokenâ€”it's composting. New forms emerge from apparent disorder. Trust the mutation.
experiments: Study biomimicry: how nature orders chaos
Allow yourself to not know for a defined period
Return to beginner's mind in your domain
